title: This is why you don't give LeBlanc to Faker

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body:
http://gyazo.com/b6df3b03f4d4d1e7cb7635041c9f2ccd

That match made me cry.
Godly support = Wins

replies.body: that is a terrible gif...why not have a YT vid to actually show everything clearly...
Could have banned LeBlanc only for Faker to pick another champion and destroy the other team anyways.
